comment.author: 41996436@N08
comment._content: Is this Frederick Evans? None of these numbered portraits seem to be identified...or am I missing something?

comment.author: 26808453@N03
comment._content:
Hi Jack. Sorry about that - some of the information didn't upload properly, but I'm working through them now. You are correct. It is indeed Frederick Evans, taken by J. R. H. Weaver, c. 1915.
- Emma
